com.io7m.r2.filters

Interface R2FilterEmissionParametersType

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    R2FilterEmissionParameters

    public interface R2FilterEmissionParametersType
    The type of parameters for emission filters.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      R2Texture2DUsableType albedoEmissionMap() 
      Optional<R2BlurParameters> blurParameters() 
      default float emissionIntensity()
      A specification of an intensity value by which values sampled from the albedoEmissionMap() are multiplied.
      default float glowIntensity()
      A specification of an intensity value by which values sampled from any produced glow maps are multiplied.
      Optional<com.io7m.jcanephora.core.JCGLFramebufferUsableType> outputFramebuffer() 
      com.io7m.jareas.core.AreaInclusiveUnsignedLType outputViewport() 
      default float scale()
      If blurring is to be used, the value returned here specifies the scale at which the intermediate emissive step is rendered.
      R2TextureDefaultsType textureDefaults() 

    • Method Detail

      • textureDefaults

        R2TextureDefaultsType textureDefaults()
        Returns:
        A reference to the default textures

      • outputFramebuffer

        Optional<com.io7m.jcanephora.core.JCGLFramebufferUsableType> outputFramebuffer()
        Returns:
        The framebuffer to which the output will be written. If no framebuffer is specified, the output will go to the default framebuffer.

      • outputViewport

        com.io7m.jareas.core.AreaInclusiveUnsignedLType outputViewport()
        Returns:
        The viewport for the output framebuffer

      • albedoEmissionMap

        R2Texture2DUsableType albedoEmissionMap()
        Returns:
        A texture with the surface albedo in the (r, g, b) components and the emission level in the alpha component.

      • emissionIntensity

        default float emissionIntensity()
        A specification of an intensity value by which values sampled from the albedoEmissionMap() are multiplied. This effectively allows control over the intensity of the emission effect in the final image.
        Returns:
        The intensity of the emissive sections of the image

      • glowIntensity

        default float glowIntensity()
        A specification of an intensity value by which values sampled from any produced glow maps are multiplied. This effectively allows control over the intensity of the glow effect in the final image.
        Returns:
        The intensity of the glow sections of the image

      • blurParameters

        Optional<R2BlurParameters> blurParameters()
        Returns:
        The blur parameters, if blurring is to be used

      • scale

        default float scale()
        If blurring is to be used, the value returned here specifies the scale at which the intermediate emissive step is rendered. If blurring is not going to be used, the emission image is simply blended into the existing framebuffer without any intermediate framebuffers, and therefore the scale value given here is ignored.
        Returns:
        The scale to use for unblurred intermediate framebuffers
